node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `user` ( `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nick` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `passwd` varchar(127) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `realname` varchar(40) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(40) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `lasttime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `karma` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `votes` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `experience` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `votesleft` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `imgsrc` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `in_room` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `acctlock` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `merit` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `numwriteups` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `validationkey` varchar(70) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `validemail` int(1) DEFAULT '0', `GP` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `sanctity` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `stars` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `session_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `user_salt` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `salt` varchar(23) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `infected` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `message_forward_to` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`), KEY `email` (`email`), KEY `lasttime` (`lasttime`), KEY `session_id` (`session_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: user
